about_the_game:
**"It Seems That We Will Never Leave Here!"**

In *The Scary Granny*, a survival horror game, terror lurks around every corner, gripping you with suspense and dread. You awaken, trapped in a decrepit building where the stench of blood fills the air, shadows stretch ominously, and eerie sounds echo through the desolate halls. Somewhere nearby, a deranged granny prowls, her intentions dark and merciless. She craves blood, and her relentless pursuit won’t stop until she finds you.

Your only hope? Run. There’s just one exit door hidden somewhere in this nightmarish maze of rooms, and it’s the only way out. But beware: there’s no way to defend yourself. Every creak, every darkened corner could be your last. Can you outwit the granny, locate the exit, and escape this haunted prison? Or will you be trapped here forever?

**Game Features:**

- Multiple chilling levels to test your nerves

- Only one exit, hidden and elusive

- No weapons, no defenses – it’s only you and your instincts

name: Scary Granny

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
